text:
Putnam Exam | 2016: B1

\begin{array}{c}\n\text { Putnam 2016: B1 } \\\nx_{0}=1 \\\nx_{n+1}=\ln \left(e^{x_{n}}-x_{n}\right) \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} x_{n}\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Putnam 2016: B1 } [/imath] [imath]x_{0}=1 [/imath] [imath]x_{n+1}=\ln \left(e^{x_{n}}-x_{n}\right) \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} x_{n}[/imath]
